snippet: The Norwegian photographer Christian Houge's project "Shadow Within" takes a close look at wolves, which he says can teach humans a lot about the instincts and impulses surpressed by culture.
abstract: The Norwegian photographer Christian Houge's project "Shadow Within" takes a close look at wolves, which he says can teach humans a lot about the instincts and impulses surpressed by culture.

headline.main: In the Shadows of Wolves and Man
